About application

Trip planner is an application used to plan multi-day trip and then arranged the plan printed on paper.
It can be used for example planning business trips or family trip. This application was created as
a bachelor‘s thesis on the university Brno, Faculty of information technology. Topic of bachelor´s thesis
was Mashup - Trip planner. Created: 2010/2011.

Adress of Trip planner: http://planovac-cest.aspone.cz/

Features of application
- plan a trip to a specific date
- search for cities around the world and show them on the map
- calculate the distance between cities
- in selected cities around the world search for accommodation
- plan your journey or connection to the destination city and back
- plan a daily schedule of activities
- view information on the weather for 6 days in advance
- printa your plan

Use application
The application runs in the familiar web browsers (Firefox, Chrome, Explorer)
A plan is done in five steps
--- the first step - choose term¨of trip
--- the second step - the selection of planned cities
--- third step - selection of accommodation in the city
--- the fourth step - fill information about transportation between cities
--- the fifth step - fill the activities for each day of travel
Then it is possible print the planned trip. In each step is the button for help
Go to next step will be taken by clicking on the ''next step'', right down.

Use technologies
The application is created with Microsoft Silverlight technologies.It's mashup
applications, and there are uses information from multiple sources:

Map data: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd877180.aspx
Search for cities: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc966793.aspx
Search for route: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc966826.aspx
Search for hotels: http://www.cleartrip.com/api/docs/hotel-api/#Info
Weather forecast http://www.wunderground.com/
